channel.title: Data Visualization on Erick Chacon
channel.description: Recent content in Data Visualization on Erick Chacon

item.title: Print eps figure with accent in matlab
item.description: Matlab is a powerfull software to plot images in different styles and formats. For this reason, researchers use it to make graphics to their papers. The eps format is one of the best to present it in papers or presentations. We usually add text in the image as the axis labels, titles or texts in certain positions.
